author: Simon Difford
description: Chartreuse adds subtle aromatics to this refreshing herbal Daiquiri/Daisy.
name: Daisy de Santiago
recipeIngredient: 60 ml White/gold 1-3 year old mellow light rum
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE first 4 ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice
DRIZZLE a spoon of Chartreuse over top of drink
